summary: January 30 is the 30th day of the year in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: The 1937 National Football League Championship game was the fifth annual championship game and was held December 12, 1937, at Wrigley Field in Chicago. The attendance was 15,870. The game featured the Western Division champions Chicago Bears  and the Eastern Division champions Washington Redskins .
title: NFL Championship Game, 1937
